title: Saisher
author: Saisher
content: This is a big surprise but many expected this to happen as he already has a hint that he will do this, he really is a cunning businessman with Twitter millions of users this is another income stream for the wealthiest man in the world and I'm sure Doge and other Cryptocurrency will be used for this monthly subscription I just hope that he included some of the top coins I'm holding like Tron.What do you think of Elon Musk's idea is it good for the Cryptocurrency indsutryQuoteNew Twitter head Elon Musk said Tuesday the site will charge $8 per month to verify users' accounts, arguing the plan would upend the platform's "current lords & peasants system" and create a new revenue stream for the company.The announcement comes days after the world's wealthiest man took sole control of the social media giant in a contentious $44 billion deal.Musk proposes charging $8 for verified Twitter account despite user backlash

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 02, 2022, 12:20:22 AMThis is a big surprise but many expected this to happen as he already has a hint that he will do this, he really is a cunning businessman with Twitter millions of users this is another income stream for the wealthiest man in the world and I'm sure Doge and other Cryptocurrency will be used for this monthly subscription I just hope that he included some of the top coins I'm holding like Tron.What do you think of Elon Musk's idea is it good for the Cryptocurrency indsutryQuoteNew Twitter head Elon Musk said Tuesday the site will charge $8 per month to verify users' accounts, arguing the plan would upend the platform's "current lords & peasants system" and create a new revenue stream for the company.The announcement comes days after the world's wealthiest man took sole control of the social media giant in a contentious $44 billion deal.Musk proposes charging $8 for verified Twitter account despite user backlashYou know if it's for crypto enthusiasts and it's implementable, of course, it's mostly in favor of people like us who are crypto lovers. But for Twitter users, I think this is not good news for them.And if this implementation happens, a large number of Twitter followers will surely stop using it and look for another social media platform that doesn't mind paying a monthly fee.And from what I have seen, it is supported by billionaires around the world and the chances of this happening are high because binance itself also supports it and so on. But I hope this proposal of Elon Musk will change. Because even if only 1/4 of the 110M followers on Twitter are left, MUSK will still get a lot of income every month because his total profit on Twitter is around 220M$ from the 27.5M followers that are left all over the world.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Taking $8/month  is not so high for legit companies to update their followers on what they are up to. Millions of companies including celebrities willing to verify accounts than have tons of fake accounts concocting them.Musk has not yet said anything about Doge for Twitter payment yet but a lot of Doge fan awaits for a word about it while buying millions of it already. Seem we have expected too much.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Elon bought something and it must also give something to him. I started to see so many complaints about that whici is understandable caused by they hate to pay a few dollars for monthly subscription which is a shame. I guess twitter's traffic was also getting helped by the bots. I can imagine how many people from third countries will think about that. Im sure they will be going to go out from twitter too. I will support this idea caused by for the real people and it would be quite cheap but not for bots in twitter.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Has he started to run out of money?   so he wants to implement this$8/month for twitter verified account doesn't that mean that if you want your account to get verified just by paying for it?I think this is a form of greed and he is starting to be controlled by greed, but maybe he doesn't implement this for fear of losing users

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on November 02, 2022, 12:20:22 AMThis is a big surprise but many expected this to happen as he already has a hint that he will do this, he really is a cunning businessman with Twitter millions of users this is another income stream for the wealthiest man in the world and I'm sure Doge and other Cryptocurrency will be used for this monthly subscription I just hope that he included some of the top coins I'm holding like Tron.What do you think of Elon Musk's idea is it good for the Cryptocurrency indsutryQuoteNew Twitter head Elon Musk said Tuesday the site will charge $8 per month to verify users' accounts, arguing the plan would upend the platform's "current lords & peasants system" and create a new revenue stream for the company.The announcement comes days after the world's wealthiest man took sole control of the social media giant in a contentious $44 billion deal.Musk proposes charging $8 for verified Twitter account despite user backlashI could see influencers and companies being willing to pay for the service as they are making more money out of the platform than those 8 dollars, but for the average person this is something they are not going to be willing to pay.And this is because not only social media websites spy on your every more and gather every single data point they can about you, now you will need to pay for the privilege? Forget it, even if 8 dollars per month is not a huge sum, I can think of several ways in which I can enjoy my 8 dollars way more than by verifying a Twitter account.

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Elon Musk is investing huge amounts of money just to acquire this and no surprise this could also be a medium to make money from growing social media users. But I don't think $8 is a satisfying amount need to pay as we are talking about it monthly. Well, we don't know what he is thinking actually but I know many people won't support that system and prioritize paying monthly just to engage in social media and paying $8 without having any return from it. Just my own opinion...

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Of course verified twitter users are likely to pay it and it shouldnt be burden to them since most of verified users are probably someone who has great subs and even monetized through advertising or whatever form. Mostly the influencers are the one got verified. Elon is quiet sneaky implementing this even though this is an additional expenses, for sure there will be a lots of changes. He is a smart guy and he definitely know what to do.

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: The idea of paying 8$ every month is pretty messed up for those who aren't crypto lover, but I understand what this man is trying to build here, this will make crypto very useful, in general it will help crypto grow up in coming years but...what about those that are using twitter for other reasons like keeping in touch with family and friends? Isn't this too much.

comments.author: Liz Truss
comments.body: Considering the fact that he got it huge amount of money, maybe he's just using that as a medium to make more money

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: Liz Truss on November 02, 2022, 08:35:45 AMConsidering the fact that he got it huge amount of money, maybe he's just using that as a medium to make more moneyIsn't it obvious though, but for sure, majority of us are very disappointed if Musk insists that the use base of Twitter will have to pay this much money.I guess there could be mass exodus, and I guess this is a bad business decision by Musk.He needs to find way to make money here, but not to the expense of the million of Twitter accounts. Of course, there are twitter users who monetized their brand and name in that platform, but what about those who are just using it to check for news and stuff?

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Goodbye to bots I guess. I'd reckon it'd be okay for people who need the verification badge to pay especially since Twitter does accommodate a huge number of users so the influence there is pretty big. It probably wouldn't work out for some small-time influencers though but big-time ones shouldn't mind it. It also paints an additional layer of guarantee that the account is legit for their followers so it's a pretty cheap price imo. If it goes past that though then things might become different. From Elon's tweet as well it seems like there's still various benefits added to the monthly charge, so I reckon it's all good. Quote from: Yaunfitda on November 02, 2022, 09:32:59 AMHe needs to find way to make money here, but not to the expense of the million of Twitter accounts. Of course, there are twitter users who monetized their brand and name in that platform, but what about those who are just using it to check for news and stuff?I think there's some type of confusion here regarding what Elon wants to do. Verified Twitter accounts are ones that have the blue badge in their name, basically guaranteeing their identity or something similar to that. Regular users can still browse Twitter without any limitations, that "Verification" tag is only for users who aim to let their fanbase know that they're real and that it's not a scam.

comments.author: Angel_gabriel
comments.body: I expected it to happen but not $8/month. Its too much for me, I can not afford that from Nigeria

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I feel good that Elon Musk has finally bought Twitter and is going to charge an $8 monthly fee. But along with paying the monthly fee to use the platform, it will also feature a verification system to eliminate bots and fake profiles. I personally do not have an issue with rich people paying $96 a year for Twitter verification. This will be good for celebrities, politicians, athletes, and social media influencers because it will allow them to see who is really following their Twitter accounts. Having verification to access Twitter will also help reduce and clean up spam.

comments.author: devil2man
comments.body: it is not a good idea twitter should remain free, indeed they should make 2 versions, a paid pro for any influencers and a free one for common users

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I don’t think I’ll pay it because I don’t care less about being verified on Twitter. I just use it as a great news source, I have close to 1600 followers which is not enough to bother being verified for.The best part about this whole thing is it will stop the bots. I do also enjoy the tears from the left, it’s made me smile.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: As an individual, no, I would not pay eight $8 dollars per month for a twitter verification. I am hardly ever on twitter and I dont see a reason to have a twitter verification.As for a business standpoint, twitter should release a beta and see what happens. I still have some doubts of what Elon Musk has mad promises in having a twitter verification.

comments.author: Tashana
comments.body: I'm not going to pay, even though I don't care about those few dollars, unless I have a good reason, and even if there is a reason, I'll be unhappy.

comments.author: Chato1977
comments.body: He will not spend that billions of dollars if he will not use this for income purposes , ELon will always be for Money .and this is what twitter users facing not only now but in the future using as well.
